If you are interested in joining us for this please register your interest in attending using the link in the comments and we’ll email you the venue details (central London) closer to the event.

text:
Information about shareholder events on Tuesday 3 February

The Smarter Web Company prospectus in relation to the proposed admission to trading of the Company’s ordinary shares on the equity shares (commercial companies) category of the UK Financial Conduct Authority’s (“FCA”) Official List, and to trading on the London Stock Exchange’s Main Market for listed securities, has been approved by the FCA and published by the Company.

Our proposed admission date is Tuesday 3 February, when we will open the day’s trading at the London Stock Exchange. We would love our shareholder community to be part of this special and momentous occasion.

Space at the opening ceremony is extremely limited, which means we are only able to offer a small number of tickets to shareholders. As an important part of our journey and very much part of the team, we felt the fairest way to allocate places was through a random selection.

To take part, please enter your details using the link in the comments. Successful applicants will be notified on Tuesday 27 January.

Evening drinks (7:00pm until 9:00pm)

To celebrate this milestone together, we have also organised an informal drinks reception on the evening of Tuesday 3 February. Between 7:00pm and 9:00pm, we would be delighted to buy our shareholders a drink and mark this momentous day together.

Please register your interest in attending using the link in the comments and we’ll email you the venue details (central London) closer to the event.

Bitcoin treasuries unconference UK

As recently announced we are pleased to host the Bitcoin Treasuries Unconference UK, a one-day, event focused on the rapidly evolving role of Bitcoin as corporate treasury capital. Find out more or buy tickets using the link in the comments.

AQUIS:
#SWC
| OTCQB:
$TSWCF
| FRA: $3M8

text:
Announcement: Bitcoin Treasuries Unconference UK

The Smarter Web Company is pleased to announce that it will host the Bitcoin Treasuries Unconference UK, a one-day, event focused on the rapidly evolving role of Bitcoin as corporate treasury capital.

The event will be held in Bristol, the birthplace of The Smarter Web Company, and is delivered in partnership with the Bitcoin Treasuries Unconference team.

The Bitcoin Treasuries Unconference UK brings together senior executives, company directors, institutional allocators and long-term Bitcoin holders for a focused exchange of real-world experience. The programme is designed specifically for those currently holding, or considering, Bitcoin on corporate balance sheets and for investors seeking to understand Bitcoin as a form of digital capital.

Please read the announcement on our website (link in comments).

You can also visit the Bitcoin Treasuries Unconference UK page on our website (link in comments).

AQUIS: #SWC | OTCQB: $TSWCF | FRA: $3M8

text:
RNS Announcement: Publication of Prospectus

The Smarter Web Company is pleased to announce that a prospectus in relation to the proposed admission to trading of the Company’s ordinary shares on the equity shares (commercial companies) category of the UK Financial Conduct Authority’s (the “FCA”) Official List and to trading on the London Stock Exchange’s Main Market for listed securities has been approved by the FCA and published by the Company today.
@asjwebley
, CEO of The Smarter Web Company, commented: “Taking a UK-born business from start-up to a public company is an achievement of which I am extremely proud. Moving to the Main Market of the London Stock Exchange marks the next significant milestone in that journey. I am committed to building a British success story that contributes to the UK economy, showcases the strength of the UK’s entrepreneurial spirit in the technology sector, and demonstrates how Bitcoin can be used as digital capital.”

Please read the RNS on our website (link in comments).

AQUIS:
#SWC
| OTCQB:
$TSWCF
| FRA: $3M8

text:
RNS Announcement: Intention to List on Main Market and Notice of GM

The Smarter Web Company announces its intention to cancel the admission to trading of its ordinary shares on the Aquis Growth Market and seek admission of its ordinary shares to the equity shares (commercial companies) category of the FCA’s Official List and to trading on the London Stock Exchange’s Main Market for listed securities. 

Please read the RNS on our website (link in comments).
